title: Dazzling Diamond Cascade Haaram - PMQN2
materials: set in a durable and lustrous [Assuming Platinum/White Gold based on appearance] alloy. Features both pear-shaped (D.PAN) and marquise-cut (D.MQ) diamonds of varying sizes for optimal brilliance. Precisely set prongs for maximum light reflection.
features: This stunning haaram boasts a graduated cascade design, featuring rows of meticulously placed diamonds. The arrangement showcases pear-shaped (D.PAN) and marquise-cut (D.MQ) diamonds, creating a visually captivating and modern aesthetic. The central floral motif adds a touch of elegance and femininity. The design utilizes a prong setting to enhance the sparkle of each stone.
colors: reflecting the brilliance of the diamonds against the bright white metal setting.
occasions: and upscale gatherings. Makes a statement piece for any special occasion
adding a touch of sophistication and glamour.
description: A true statement piece, this diamond haaram is designed to capture attention and elevate any outfit. The combination of pear and marquise cut diamonds creates a unique and eye-catching design. The meticulously crafted prong setting ensures the longevity and brilliance of each diamond. The quality of the stones and the modern design make this haaram a valuable investment.
